content:
I'm happy to try and help you identify the park, but I'm a large language model, I don't have have access to your location or personal information, so I won't be able to pinpoint the exact park without more details.

However, I can try to help you narrow down the options. Can you tell me:

1. What city or region do you live in?
2. What type of scenery did you see on your hike (e.g. mountains, hills, forests, coastal views)?
3. Were there any distinctive features or landmarks on the trail, such as a lake, river, or unique rock formations?
4. Do you remember any signs or markings on the trail, such as a park name or trail name?

Any additional details you can provide will help me try to identify the park or suggest similar trails in your area.
